definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

pinyin: Huang2 guan1 Jia4 ri4 Jiu3 dian4

sentences.english: Ensure compliance to Crowne Plaza Keys mandatories and implementation of new standards.
sentences.chinese: 确保编辑皇冠假日主要条款并执行新标准。

sentences.english: During the holiday, tens of hundreds of people enjoy themselves on Quancheng square.
sentences.chinese: 假日期间，许多人在泉城广场休闲。

sentences.english: The Rooks Holiday Hotel, Mae Hong Son is set in the midst of a fascinating valley in Northern Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 茹克思假日饭店坐落在泰国北部一处迷人的山谷之中。

sentences.english: The argumentation on"holiday economic"had aroused a violent disturbance in China.
sentences.chinese: 关于“假日经济”的大讨论在中国引起了轩然大波。

sentences.english: They have wheedled a holiday from the headmaster.
sentences.chinese: 他们哄骗校长而获得了假日。

sentences.english: Changes have also occurred stealthily/quietly in recreational consumption during holiday seasons.
sentences.chinese: 从节假日购物消费来看，同样也在悄然发生着变化。

sentences.english: One holiday afternoon his cousin Fred came to pay him a visit.
sentences.chinese: 一个假日的下午，他的堂哥福瑞德拜访他。

sentences.english: My credit card bill is due on the third of every month.
sentences.chinese: 十月三号是德国的国定假日。

sentences.english: the deadline fall in the vacation or holiday , it can be put off in turn .
sentences.chinese: 不过期限的最后一日如果是节假日，可以顺延。

sentences.english: Holiday economics brought a lot of profits to hotels and tourism.
sentences.chinese: 假日经济给宾馆和旅游业带来了很大利润。

sentences.english: Our holiday plans have gone phut.
sentences.chinese: 我们的假日计画已经吹了。

sentences.english: His longing for the holidays was caused by his homesickness.
sentences.chinese: 他渴望假日是由于他的思乡病引起的。

sentences.english: My father spent a busman's holiday working in his office.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸的假日“有名无实”，整个假期他都呆在办公室。

sentences.english: Welcome to this scenic place, where you'll find an endless enjoyment for your holiday.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎光临风韵之境，给您的假日增添无穷乐趣。

sentences.english: That doesn't mean she doesn't want to bonk you in the Holiday Inn hot tub.
sentences.chinese: 但这些并不表明她不想跟你在假日酒店的热浴缸坐爱。

sentences.english: This photo was taken by me at a Yacht club in Singapore, somewhere in Tanah Merah.
sentences.chinese: 这张照片是我在新加坡的国防部队的假日营所拍的。

definition: to have a holiday or vacation
to go on a tour/to have an outing
